name: Candler Park
description: Candler Park is a 55 acre park on the east side of Atlanta. The northern half of the park features a 9-hole public golf course. Rounds are $10 each. The southern half of the park includes a pool, tennis courts, football/soccer fields, basketball courts, a playground and nature trails. The park is the host to a variety of festivals in the warmer months.
parking: There is plenty of parking within the park and along Candler Park Dr.
